sentence: 11 |||  ||| 0.11 ||| All patients were referred at least 6 months after a major coronary event, including acute myocardial infarction, coronary artery bypass grafting or percutaneous balloon angioplasty for acute coronary syndrome.

sentence: 1 |||  ||| 0.1 ||| The purpose of this prospective randomized controlled trial was to assess the impact of phase III comprehensive cardiac rehabilitation (CR) on health-related quality of life (HRQOL) in elderly patients with coronary artery disease (CAD).
label: pr.Disease

sentence: 2 |||  ||| 0.2 ||| Thirty-eight elderly males (mean age, 70 years) with CAD were stratified as the intervention group (n=20) and the control group (n=18).
label: po.Size

sentence: 25 |||  ||| 0.25 ||| The weekly supervised exercise session at the clinic consisted of approximately 20 min of warm-up exercises including stretching and calisthenics, followed by 20-30 min of continuous upright aerobic and dynamic exercise (various combinations of walking, bicycling, jogging, and other activities) quantitatively and light isometric exercise, such as hand weights, and approximately 20 min of cool-down stretching and calisthenics.
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 23 |||  ||| 0.23 ||| In the intervention group, patients participated in an outpatient phase III CR program for 6 months.
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 13 |||  ||| 0.13 ||| In the intervention group, subjects participated in an outpatient phase III CR and exercise training program, whereas the control group were followed up with standard care as an outpatients.
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 3 |||  ||| 0.3 ||| In the intervention group, patients participated in CR for 6 months, whereas in the control group, they received standard care.
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 57 ||| Statistical Analysis ||| 1.12 ||| In contrast, the depression scores of the SDS of both groups were not changed significantly after 6 months of rehabilitation.
label: o.Treatment

sentence: 6 |||  ||| 0.6 ||| After 6 months, in the intervention group, scores of bodily pain, general health, vitality and mental health of SF-36 improved significantly compared with baseline.

sentence: 51 ||| Statistical Analysis ||| 1.6 ||| In the intervention group, scores of 7 domains, except for role emotional, increased after 6 months of CR compared with baseline.

sentence: 55 ||| Statistical Analysis ||| 1.10 ||| In the intervention group, although trait anxiety scores were not changed significantly, state anxiety scores were significantly improved after 6 months of rehabilitation (p<0.01).
